website_summaries.verdict: A simple, affordable, long lasting, and effective solution to your most common clothing, hat, towel, and scarf storage issues.
cons: Be warned that you should not attempt to install this over door hook rack from a hollow door, as this may damage your door

customer_reviews.title: Good Make :: But loose on my door
customer_reviews.text: The door rack is pretty good make and well built. It is asthetic abd looks good on the door. It looks like it can take good weight. But the bad thing is it is loose on my door and there is no me mechanism to secure it. It moves and make noises when I close or open the door. As a thoughtful gesture from the seller they have included EVA pads but that’s not enough to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: manik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive hanger
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hanger so much that I ordered another one! It has nine staggered hooks. The metal is quality, for the price. I use one on the back of my front door and it holds many coats (including a dog's!) along with dog collars and leashes. The other I use on the back of my bedroom door for nightgowns, robes and unmentionables. Very sturdy - I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our camper. One came and is fine, seems sturdy. The other one, same exact product, was bent into a “u” shape. It’s sturdy metal, and ther is no way to bend it back. Returning it now, but wondering why on earth they would bother sending an OBVIOUSLY defective product to me. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these. One arrived as described. The other arrived missing one door hook and with the other door hook bent at 45 degrees. Clearly a manufacturing quality control slip. How it got through packaging, shipping and distribution is a mystery to me. The one that arrived intact works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Strong and door closes easily
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and holds five wet towels after showers, which is what I needed since our children are all grown and married, bringing their spouses and families home. The door closes easily, too, which was a concern since our bathroom door is a solid fit in its frame. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tru2My Style

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: The hooks that hang over the top of the door are too thick, the door doesn't close. I had to cut them off and screw rack to the door.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it but it came with one side BENT OUT ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but it came with one side BENT OUT OF LINE. I'm so disappointed I have to return it because it looks stupid on the door and I don't know if I should order another one even though I really like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy - fits door top nicely
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this item. it was very heavy so it doesn't "rattle" when opening/closing the door. I purchased this because my last rack didn't fit the top of my door very nicely. This one does a great job. It is also really sturdy! Very pleased with purhcase. Would buy this again, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: AP Chicago

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a couple of these and they work great for my doorways
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple of these and they work great for my doorways. I did notice that the horizontal bars one of racks are not level, like they were welded wrong, but it doesn't affect the strength and you can't see it once the coats are piled on :-)
customer_reviews.author: superbeau

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, we hang 2 full size bath robes, a few jackets a couple of towels and the rack hasn't broken a sweat, while the door might not hold much more. Well worth the price and it looks nice. Only problem I have with it is I wish the hooks were about 1/2" more apart then it would have been perfection. 1/2" doesn't seem like much, but it really is when hanging robes and jackets.
customer_reviews.author: MrRockets

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but too bad it didn't fit the door. The hooks were too narrow for my daughter's dorm room door.
customer_reviews.author: Cherlyn R

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the mail with one side broken off. It seemed to fit over my door initially but was actually too tight and chipped off some paint when I tried to take it down.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Hangar
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! It's study has plenty of hooks , goes on easy on a door but my favorite comes assembled just straight out of the box ready for use!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.Davis

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit on the door
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit over the door. If you put it over the door ; the door will not close. We ended up cutting it and mounting it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for drying un-dry-ables
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the door that hides my washer and dryer -- and use it to hang workout clothes and unmentionables that can't go into the dryer. It's perfect in this function -- just wish it hung a little lower. As a 5'4" female, I sometimes have to jump to hang things.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Over the door hooks are wonderful for the bed or bath!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Esylife Over the Door Hook Organizer Rack. I have it in my bedroom where I can access my robe and PJ's easily. Fits nicely over the door without too much showing on the outside of the door. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wise

customer_reviews.title: O... M... G. ...
customer_reviews.text: O... M... G... This thing is a life saver! I have one on both sides of all 13 doors in my house. Also put 9 of them up in the garage door tools. I have two in the basement to hang air filters from and one hanging from the clothes line in my yard... I just can't even!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Cool and functional but if you have heavy towels the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool and functional but if you have heavy towels the hooks are not long enough, and the towels slip from time to time
customer_reviews.author: casual cal

customer_reviews.title: Get one from Target, don’t get this one.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold a towel.. the knobs are too slick and unless my towel is around 1-2 of them (not spread out allowing it to dry) it falls off. It’s also very heavy and shuts my door.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good but smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, nothing damaged or bent. It works good. Just smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Mine wasn’t broken or bent but it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Mine wasn’t broken or bent but it’s so thick I don’t have a door in the house that will close with this on it. Even my closet doors that have so much room at the top you can actually see inside, this won’t let the door close.
customer_reviews.author: Kepela

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: I am using this over the door of the closet in my utility room. It is strong enough for heavy men's work coats. I can't see ever being able to use all the hooks because they are too close together.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: i love this item and would have given a higher rating ...
customer_reviews.text: i love this item and would have given a higher rating but when arrived in the box, it was folded in half! how do you hang an over the door organizer folded? i had to straighten it out before i could hang it and it still a little off but hey, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: The pads they provide to protect your doors are brilliant. I have marks on all the tops of ...
customer_reviews.text: These racks exceeded my expectations! The pads they provide to protect your doors are brilliant. I have marks on all the tops of my doors from previous racks but the pads make the rack fit soft and snug. I will definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hooks!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have 3 now in the house, lots of hooks! Be sure to note the stickies you put on the inside of the hooks so you don’t mess up your doors.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought them as pair
customer_reviews.text: This is what i was looking for. Glad i bought them as pair. Love that the hooks are staggered and NOT on top of each other as im able to locate anything off the door hook. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wong

customer_reviews.title: All great
customer_reviews.text: I checked all the reviews, some are bad and most are good, i bought 3 all at once 1 each for my kids room and ours and all came perfectly fine!! No crooked hooks.. all good, and love amazon, FAST SHIPPING!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my door perfectly, but one of the corners was a little bent but didnt return it

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: Great over the door rack. It fits perfectly on the average size bathroom door and it can still easily be closed after hanging. My daughter has filled this rack up and it still hangs nicely with no sagging.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this, we just remodeled the bathroom and this was a perfect fit for the new vibe. It came broken, one of the brackets came was broke at the weld, making it not useable.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! I'm renting and don't want ...

customer_reviews.title: Shiny but unsatisfactory

Smh I would have been better off getting one from the discount store near me. I think I damaged the bathroom door trying to squeeze this thing on. Settled on just using it in the bedroom.

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of hanging space!

product_meta.title: TQVAI Over The Door Hook Hanger Heavy Duty Coat Hooks Rack Organizer, 9 Hooks, Chrome Silver
product_meta.description:
Color Name:Chrome SilverBefore we sell this hanging door rack,we test its weight capactiy,the max capacity we tested is 36 lbs,for we use it to hang my 36 lbs(Nearly 15KGS) backpacks on we solid door, it work well.But if your door is hollow, not solid, any hanging rack or door mouted rack will damage your door if you use them to hang your heavey items,though they can keep them.It no means our door rack can't hang on hollow door, just do not hang too heavy items,on way to protect your door, the other way to let this rack plays its biggest use. 
This strong over the door hooks provides 9 chrome plated hooks for hanging coats, belts, trousers, or any other type of clothes, towels, bathrobes and other clothing items.
Coat Hooks ware easy to install and use, this coat rack perfectly fits for use in your bedroom, bathroom, guest bedroom or even your laundry room.
feature_bullets: The Over the Door Hook Rack is perfect for anyone who needs more hanging space
Sturdy steel construction and chrome finish, bright sliver color, waterproof and rustproof anti-corrosion; Bearing capacity: 36 lbs

Fits standard doors up to 1-3/4 inch thick, and features 2 pcs EVA black anti-scrathing pads, depended on your door depth, if you tab this in the hanging clips but the door can't close, you needn't use them
Beautiful supreme quality with 9 Hooks,Multi-Purpose for Coat Hook, Hat Hook, Bag Hook

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
